questions.question: What type of soil analysis was performed in the study?
questions.description: Identify if it was a physical, chemical, biological, or a combination analysis

questions.question: What were the main characteristics of the soil found?
questions.description: Texture, pH, nutrient levels, organic matter, among others

questions.question: What agricultural recommendations were derived from the study?
questions.description: Suggestions for appropriate crops, fertilization, irrigation, etc.

questions.question: What limitations or problems of the soil were identified?
questions.description: Presence of salts, compaction, low fertility, erosion, etc.

questions.question: How are the results of the study related to the productivity of the land?
questions.description: Analysis of the impact on agricultural yield
